feed.title: cpprefjp - C++日本語リファレンス

entry.title: to_string -- Revert "to_string/to_wstring : 実装例として浮動小数点数は%fじゃなく%gだった"
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/string/to_string.md b/reference/string/to_string.md
index 5d1866eb2..8cbbb3b90 100644
--- a/reference/string/to_string.md
+++ b/reference/string/to_string.md
@@ -121,7 +121,7 @@ std::string to_string(float val)
   char buffer[std::numeric_limits<float>::max_exponent10 + 1
           + 6   // fixed precision (printf's default)
           + 3]; // '-' + '.' + '\0'
-  std::sprintf(buffer, "%g", val);
+  std::sprintf(buffer, "%f", val);
   return buffer;
 }
 
@@ -130,7 +130,7 @@ std::string to_string(double val)
   char buffer[std::numeric_limits<double>::max_exponent10 + 1
           + 6   // fixed precision (printf's default)
           + 3]; // '-' + '.' + '\0'
-  std::sprintf(buffer, "%g", val);
+  std::sprintf(buffer, "%f", val);
   return buffer;
 }
 
@@ -139,7 +139,7 @@ std::string to_string(long double val)
   char buffer[std::numeric_limits<long double>::max_exponent10 + 1
           + 6   // fixed precision (printf's default)
           + 3]; // '-' + '.' + '\0'
-  std::sprintf(buffer, "%Lg", val);
+  std::sprintf(buffer, "%Lf", val);
   return buffer;
 }
 ```

entry.title: to_wstring -- Revert "to_string/to_wstring : 実装例として浮動小数点数は%fじゃなく%gだった"
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/string/to_wstring.md b/reference/string/to_wstring.md
index 99ec7344e..665f5570d 100644
--- a/reference/string/to_wstring.md
+++ b/reference/string/to_wstring.md
@@ -128,7 +128,7 @@ std::wstring to_wstring(float val)
                            + 6  // fixed precision (printf's default)
                            + 3; // '-' + '.' + '\0'
   wchar_t buffer[size];
-  std::swprintf(buffer, size, L"%g", val);
+  std::swprintf(buffer, size, L"%f", val);
   return buffer;
 }
 
@@ -139,7 +139,7 @@ std::wstring to_wstring(double val)
                            + 3; // '-' + '.' + '\0'
 
   wchar_t buffer[size];
-  std::swprintf(buffer, size, L"%g", val);
+  std::swprintf(buffer, size, L"%f", val);
   return buffer;
 }
 
@@ -149,7 +149,7 @@ std::wstring to_wstring(long double val)
                            + 6  // fixed precision (printf's default)
                            + 3; // '-' + '.' + '\0'
   wchar_t buffer[size];
-  std::swprintf(buffer, size, L"%Lg", val);
+  std::swprintf(buffer, size, L"%Lf", val);
   return buffer;
 }
 ```

entry.title: cmp_not_equal -- Update cmp_not_equal.md
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/utility/cmp_not_equal.md b/reference/utility/cmp_not_equal.md
index 0368fc409..642235b50 100644
--- a/reference/utility/cmp_not_equal.md
+++ b/reference/utility/cmp_not_equal.md
@@ -28,7 +28,7 @@ for (int i = 0; i < v.size(); ++i) {}
 以下と等価：
 
 ```cpp
-return cmp_equal(t, u);
+return !cmp_equal(t, u);
 ```
 * cmp_equal[link cmp_equal.md]
